IHLGM.IS.long_name: Ihlas Gayrimenkul Proje Gelistirme ve Ticaret A.S.
IHLGM.IS.summary: Ihlas Gayrimenkul Proje Gelistirme ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the mining, construction, marketing, and energy businesses. The company is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

TDGYO.IS.summary: Trend Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. engages in the real estate business in Turkey and internationally. The company develops and constructs various real estate projects, such as houses, hotels, and residence and university buildings. It also provides real estate consultancy services. The company was formerly known as Anda Gayrimenkul Gelistirme ve Insaat Sanayi Ticaret Limited Sirketi and changed its name to Trend Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. in November 2017. Trend Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. was founded in 2006 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
